items.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement an AI-based system to provide personalized product recommendations to users based on browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 personalized product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update dynamically based on user's recent interactions within 24 hours.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate improvement over baseline.
Non-logged-in users receive recommendations based on trending products.
dependencies: User profile and purchase history data availability
non_functional: Scalable to handle 1 million daily active users

notes: Assumed that the platform already has a product catalog and user account system. Specific AI model type and data privacy compliance requirements need clarification.
